entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net9.0] Shift platforms specific code from HybridWebView to the handler using Command Mappers #24269
    9.0-rc1
  • Rewrite `RadioButtonGroup` to solve memory issues #24264
  • Add Tag property to Element #24262
    Backlog
  • Targeting Android SDK 33 but seen error related to targetSDK=35 (Android.App.MissingForegroundServiceTypeException) at runtime. #24260
  • Make the MergedStyle and its property Style (that is of type IStyle) public #24257
    9.0-rc1
  • [Binding SG] Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their counterparts #24255
    .NET 9 Planning
  • PanGestureRecognizer behaves differnetly on Windows to other platforms #24252

Closed

  • Problem initializing WindowsForms.BlazorWebView -- The path is empty. (Parameter 'relativeTo') #24234
  • OnIdiom doesn't respect Desktop setting on Windows #22093
    Backlog
  • Error with running a blank MAUI project #23460
  • [Android] Resolve issues with FlyoutPage recreating the details page whenever it's navigated to #22919
  • InAppBillingPlugin support for NET8 #24249

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
  • [android] improve performance of `StrokeExtensions` #24267
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
  • Update the mac/iOS workloads #24263
  • Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their counterparts #24256
  • [net9] Add styling and Shell to Blazor Hybrid templates #24254
    area-templates
  • Add styling and Shell to Blazor Hybrid template #24253
    area-templates

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24115
    area-infrastructure
  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Add some defensive code around layout propagation #24217
  • Print the workload rollback after install #24265
  • Update bug report template with .NET 9 preview 7 #24261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨, area-controls-window

Updated

  • Fix cake scripts to work locally #24111
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Control device tests #24128
    testing-green-ci
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24160
    community ✨
  • Backport maestro and artifact drop infra improvements from net9.0 #24247
    area-infrastructure
  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • [android] cache `Join` and `Cap` enum values #24248
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Introduce WindowProvider and add to Scoped ServiceProvider #24081
  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
